text: Zisas mbara kha nzambarar ana muuŋgi, “Mbik, ndu thaŋ nzuav nzi? Ndu the nzuav gari?” Maria khueŋ ndɨkndɨgi, “Mba mɨna gari guma thi?” Ana maaŋ muuŋgiap khaŋ ana nzuai, “Guma, ndu maaŋ muuŋgip ana khuma ndigi ŋgɨp mba ŋana thuen tɨgɨp, ndu mba ŋaneŋ bun na suaŋgirim, gu ŋgɨp ana khuma ndirga.”
